summary: In which Sheogorath discovers the Creation Kit
descriptionHtml:
This is a MUCH easier way to drive people crazy than using my Princely Powers. WHO KNEW? I did. That\'s who. Enjoy your WATER.

You know, I hear Riften is a lovely town. Full of thieves, and dishonest men. WONDERFUL PLACE. Although I hear the market place there is a good place to find cheese... AND YOU KNOW HOW I FEEL ABOUT CHEESE. Or do you? Yes. Perhaps.

YOU NEED INSTRUCTIONS?

Of course you do. You\'re only mortal.

Extract the contents to your Data folder AND LET THE MADNESS BEGIN! 

You want to know my madness? IMPOSSIBLE. Besides, what sort of surprise would it be if you were expecting it? HMM? A terrible one. HORRIBLE. Almost as bad as not having cheese DURING A FUNERAL. Why don\'t you just skip off to Riften and buy some CHEESE.
author: Sheogorath
